Title: Userbase: Docs - API
Published Date: 2008-01-01T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://userbase.com/docs/api
Text: Userbase: Docs - API
[![Userbase](https://userbase.com/70ddd55fe9c2df5cc8c20f0047db6558.png)](https://userbase.com/)
## [Docs](https://userbase.com/docs/): API
Access Userbase from any context via REST endpoints exposed by the Admin API. To access the Admin API, you need to get an Access Token from the[Account](https://v1.userbase.com/#edit-account)section in your Admin panel.
### Users
Use these APIs to authenticate your user, and retrieve or modify your users' metadata.
* [Verify Auth Token](https://userbase.com/docs/api/verify-auth-token/)
* [Get User](https://userbase.com/docs/api/get-user/)
* [Update User](https://userbase.com/docs/api/update-user/)
* [List Users](https://userbase.com/docs/api/list-users/)
* [List Database Users](https://userbase.com/docs/api/list-database-users/)### Apps
Use these APIs to retrieve apps' metadata.
* [Get App](https://userbase.com/docs/api/get-app/)
* [List Apps](https://userbase.com/docs/api/list-apps/)
